name: Simple 1500 Series: Hello Kitty Vol.04: Trump
overview: Trump or trumps or trump suit are terms used in trick-taking games, traditionally called whist-style games although the best-known example may now be bridge, where cards of one suit rank above all non-trump cards, and automatically prevail over them, losing only to a higher trump if one is played to the same trick. The fourth game in the Simple 1500 series Hello Kitty is a collection of different bridge (trump) games in which the player can play against the computer or another human player.
